Chapter 55

Translator: Mosstree


Chapter 55: Rebelling Against Sister Hui? Little Cousin's Surprise Attack!


【towh:


sweet-stewed, shiny dessert, cat, T】


On top of the notebook, Qi Zhifan wrote a few strokes and recorded the things that had left the deepest impression between him and Wei Han.


A bowl of sweet-stewed snow pear that they both had personally made for each other;


Not turning his back on Wei Han, the piano expert Qi Zhifan played the shiny “Twinkle, Twinkle Little Star” song together with Wei Han;


Qi Zhifan knew that Wei Han loved desserts the most; he hoped that there would always be a Doraemon cat beside him, with a magical hundred treasures pouch that could help him realize his wishes;


Due to a misunderstanding, Wei Han first made a stupid mistake and couldn’t help but pull down Qi Zhifan’s face, and then Qi Zhifan continued to keep the sexy pink, T-shaped thong. Over time, Qi Zhifan looked at it and thought of its owner everyday. Finally, one day, he personally helped Wei Han put it on…


These things, Wei Han understood them all. He used the notebook to record down many things, but Qi Zhifan deeply noted them in his heart instead. Closing the “Odd Trouble Grievances Record”, Wei Han went downstairs.


In the kitchen on the first floor, Qi Zhifan was cooking for him. The rare times when Young Master Qi cooked, it was always for Wei Han. Who told Wei Han a few days ago to make himself feel uncomfortable because of Ou Yizhe, but also to foolishly suppress his grievances all in his heart.


Wei Han hugged Qi Zhifan from behind. “Trouble, how are you so good.”


“……” Qi Zhifan was a bit distracted and then the corner of his lips quirked up.


Don’t know who was drunk the day before yesterday and continuously listed out his shortcomings and kept scolding him ‘bastard’? Even earlier, this fool always called him ‘slag gong’ over and over again.


“I’m not a good person.” Qi Zhifan turned around and shook his head at Wei Han. “You used to scold me before, did you forget? In fact, everything you said was right.”


“Eh?” Wei Han was foolish, and suddenly remembered that Qi Zhifan’s memory was amazing and he could only force a laugh and say, “Good Trouble, don’t hold grudges.”


Qi Zhifan hooked his lips and smiled with an unknown meaning. He reached out and touched Wei Han’s face. “I want to remember.”


Wei Han: “Uh…”


Actually, Qi Zhifan also admitted that sometimes he was selfish and still considered money above all else. He never wasted time and energy on other insignificant people, but he wanted to set aside all his goodness for Wei Han.


In the evening, the sky suddenly clouded over and it soon began to rain heavily.


Across the bedroom at the French windows, Wei Han stared out of the window, an uneasiness rising up from the bottom of his heart, becoming heavier and heavier. The storm tonight seemed to herald something.


Seeing Wei Han suddenly with a worried frown, Qi Zhifan came to cling to his waist and also held his hand. “Pei Yuyang went to Jiang Chengrui’s home.”


Hearing this, Wei Han jumped in fright. “Ah? Then now, he wouldn’t be…”


Qi Zhifan nodded. “Do you know what Pei Yuyang told me? He said that his father had always known that he liked men, so he didn’t count on him. He has lived for more than twenty years, and this was the first time he has liked someone so much.”


After hearing this, Wei Han was silent for a moment before slowly saying, “They will definitely pass through this difficult time.”


“Yeah,” Qi Zhifan responded. His fingers laced between Wei Han’s fingers, slowly interlocking their ten fingers. “Wei Han, in a few days, go with me to see grandpa.”


Wei Han’s heart shuddered and he further tightened his hands around Qi Zhifan’s. “Alright.”


The next day, Jiang Chengrui didn’t appear at the bureau. Wei Han vaguely guessed that something happened and gave him a call to ask. Sure enough, the problem came from his sister, Jiang Chenghui’s body again. Last night, Jiang Chenghui vomited blood and was rushed to the hospital.


After work, Wei Han hurried to the hospital to see Jiang Chengrui. Since Jiang Chenghui didn’t want to see Jiang Chengrui at that time, he could only stay outside the ward. When Wei Han saw him, Jiang Chengrui was leaning against the wall and looking up at the ceiling with barely any focus in his eyes.


“Little Jiang, you and Pei Yuyang last night…” Wei Han didn’t know how to start talking.


“Last night…” Jiang Chengrui said faintly and then slowly narrated it for Wei Han.


Pei Yuyang was downstairs from Jiang Chengrui’s house, but Jiang Chenghui wouldn’t allow him to come up no matter what they said. Pei Yuyang had knelt in the heavy rain and pleaded for Jiang Chenghui to hand over her brother. Seeing this, Jiang Chengrui also knelt down and Little Yi kept crying by the side. The five Chihuahuas in their family were restless and howled non-stop.


Because the activity was too noisy, it also alarmed the neighbors upstairs and downstairs, and they came out to watch.


Jiang Chenghui was so angry her face turned green. She pointed at her brother and sneered, “Heh, do you remember? It was raining like this when you killed our parents. Now you want to anger me to death?”


“I’m sorry! But I really like him.” Jiang Chengrui squeezed his palms and the head that had been hanging low before suddenly lifted up. “Sister, tell me: what’s wrong with liking someone?”


“……” Jiang Chenghui’s words and thoughts were stifled, her body trembling with anger. In the next second, she spat out a mouthful of blood.


Then, as the people’s faces changed greatly, they hurriedly sent her to the hospital that very night.


“Silly Han, the doctor told me that if my sister’s mood still continues to fluctuate like this, it will affect her physical condition and it’s likely to become stomach cancer.”


Wei Han eyes instantly widened. “Is it true?”


Jiang Chengrui helplessly nodded. “My sister has abdominal pain from time to time now. She has no appetite, and if she’s stimulated, she’d vomit blood. Silly Han, I really don’t know what to do.”


Seeing Jiang Chengrui lose his former vitality even more, his eyes flowing with wisps of sorrow and his face filled with exhaustion, Wei Han couldn’t help but feel distressed.


He was thinking of comforting him when Pei Yuyang came up from behind. “Curlie, don’t be afraid. There’s still me.”


Wei Han and Jiang Chengrui looked up and found that he was followed by another man they hadn’t seen before.


Jiang Chengrui, in a daze: “Pei Yuyang, he is?”


Not waiting for Pei Yuyang to speak, the man came forward two steps and smiled at Jiang Chengrui. “Little Rui, could it be that you don’t remember me? I’m your sister’s college classmate, Pan Xin.”


“Brother Pan Xin?!” Jiang Chengrui jumped in fright. “You…didn’t you go abroad?”


“Yeah, but I’m back now. I want to go in and see Little Hui, can I?” Pan Xin said, his worried eyes looking inside.


Jiang Chengrui stared blankly and then nodded. “Mhm.”


After Pan Xin knocked on the door and entered, Wei Han moved closer to Jiang Chengrui and quietly asked, “Hey, Little Jiang, this college classmate of your sister, he…he wouldn’t be your sister’s ex-boyfriend?”


“Probably should be.” Jiang Chengrui pursed his lips. When his parents were still there, he was always having fun and didn’t take too much interest in his sister Jiang Chenghui’s matters. He only vaguely remembered that Pan Xin often went to cram school with his sister. Later, when he graduated and went abroad, Jiang Chenghui seemed to be sad for a while.


Now that Pan Xin had reappeared, perhaps his sister’s feelings would have a turning point. Then his and Pei Yuyang’s matter maybe would also…


Jiang Chengrui couldn’t help but sigh. Pei Yuyang really had a way. Exactly how had he gotten him to come back?


“Pei Yuyang, you…”


Pei Yuyang interrupted him. Tightly holding Jiang Chengrui’s hands, he snuggled close to his cheek with a face smiling tenderly. “Curlie, everything will be fine.”


After this, Pan Xin came to see Jiang Chenghui almost everyday, and Pei Yuyang would also come, both of them meticulously taking care of Jiang Chenghui. The ice-cold Jiang Chenghui drove them out repeatedly, but it seemed to be useless. The next day, they would grin thick-skinned and run over. After all, this was a lasting psychological war.


Over time, Jiang Chenghui was also too lazy to drive them out. She also understood her own physical condition and had to restrain her anger as much as possible, so she let them ‘serve’ her.


On Sunday morning, Qi Zhifan went out to buy Wei Han’s favorite egg-filling cake. And Wei Han, who was ruthlessly ‘loved’ last night, was lying softly in bed.


thump thump thump! Suddenly, a burst of eager footsteps sounded. Wei Han heard that it didn’t belong to Qi Zhifan and was puzzling over it when a joyous cry came over, “Brother Zhifan, Brother Zhifan~”


Fuck! Wei Han was suddenly scared and sat up. Wasn’t this Wu Yunqi? Why did this little princess suddenly come over? Making a ‘surprise attack’ ah!


So when Wu Yunqi excitedly ran up to the second floor, she ran through the rooms but didn’t see Qi Zhifan. Instead, she saw Wei Han, who’d just dressed but hadn’t had the time to fold the quilt yet.


The joy on her face suddenly disappeared without a trace. Pouting her little mouth, she said, “Wei Foxy Spirit, where’s Brother Zhifan?”


Wei Han hurriedly grabbed his messy hair. “Oh, he went out. Maybe he’d be back in a moment.”


Wu Yunqi looked disgusted. “Wei Foxy Spirit, the sun’s already shining on your butt, how come you’re still not up? You’re really too lazy and should learn from the hard-working Brother Zhifan.”


Wei Han: “……”


He would get up so late, the main culprit was Qi Zhifan ah!


Wu Yunqi’s eyes looked in again, looking up and down at the room where Wei Han was in. Finding that everything was Doraemon blue, she tightly knitted her brows. “Wei Foxy Spirit, this is your room?”


“Yes.”


After hearing this, Wu Yunqi despised him even more. “I didn’t realize that you’re such a big man, but you’re actually even more childish than me. If I was Brother Zhifan, I must be ashamed to have such a big brother.”


“cough cough…” Wei Han dryly coughed twice, raising his eyebrows. “I’m sorry, this childish room was decorated by your dear Brother Zhifan.”


Wu Yunqi stared blankly for three seconds and then her eyes immediately lighted up. “My Brother Zhifan really has a ‘childish heart that hasn’t vanish’, so cute ah.”


Wei Han: “……”


Soon, Qi Zhifan came back. When he saw his little cousin Wu Yunqi, he was also surprised. “Yunqi, why are you here?”


Wu Yunqi’s face burst into a sweet smile. “Hehe, I haven’t seen Brother Zhifan for a long time and I miss you.”


Qi Zhifan touched her head with his hand and shot a glance out of the corner of his eye at Wei Han on the side. He found that Wei Han didn’t care too much, instead happily munching on the egg-filling cake that he’d just bought back.


“My mom has already agreed to let me come here and stay for a night.” Wu Yunqi smiled happily. At the end, she specially stressed a sentence, ” So Brother Zhifan, you will sleep with me tonight.”


“……”


Qi Zhifan was startled for a moment and originally wanted to refuse. In the end, Wei Han immediately received the words and continuously nodded, “Good, good, good, your Brother Zhifan is certainly willing.”


If Qi Zhifan accompanied his little cousin tonight, then he could escape his evil clutches and let his poor chrysanthemum avoid the ravage.


Seeing Wei Han had this kind of attitude, Qi Zhifan was a little displeased. If he accompanied others to sleep, Wei Han this guy wouldn’t be jealous?


After thinking about it, Wei Han, this Wei fool wouldn’t be jealous of a little girl, but he still cared a bit in his heart. At night, unlike as usual, Wei Han was lying alone in a big, empty bed. Without Qi Zhifan’s hot body fitting snugly against him, he was a bit unaccustomed to it.


When he got up to go to the bathroom, he passed by Qi Zhifan’s room and found that Qi Zhifan and Wu Yunqi were still awake and could vaguely hear their voices.


“Brother Zhifan, do you still like Wei Han?”


“……” Qi Zhifan didn’t speak, agreeing by default.


“Hmph!” The little cousin pouted her mouth sadly. “Then do you like me better or him?”


“These are two kinds of like and can’t be confused.”


Wu Yunqi shook her head. “I don’t care! You have to answer me. If you don’t choose one, I will suffer from insomnia and can’t sleep.”


“Wei Han,” Qi Zhifan said without hesitation.


Wu Yunqi: “……”


Do you have to answer so quickly ah? Seeing Qi Zhifan had this kind of reaction, she immediately felt that she didn’t even have a wee bit of a chance left.


Outside the door, as soon as he heard his name, Wei Han’s face flushed red, a bit embarrassed, but there was a taste of sweetness in his heart.


“Brother Zhifan, grandpa has always loved you so much. You know…you know he’d be furious if he knows. Then Wei Han and grandpa: who are you going to choose?”
